title._content: Kaiserin visiting a train of the wounded at Breslau  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Kaiserin visiting a train of the wounded at Breslau [between ca. 1914 and ca. 1915] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows Augusta Victoria of Schleswig-Holstein (1858-1921), the last German Empress and Queen of Prussia (wife of Wilhelm II), visiting wounded soldiers on a train at Breslau, Prussia (now Wroclaw, Poland). (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18126 Call Number: LC-B2- 3347-6
